articles.title: India's Covid Positivity Rate Drops Below 10%, 1.61 Lakh New Cases - NDTV
articles.description: India today recorded 1.61 lakh news Covid cases in the last 24 hours, 3% lower than yesterday. The daily positivity rate has dropped to 9.26 per cent from 11.6 per cent, while the weekly positive rate is 14.15%.
articles.content:
• The 1,61,386 new Covid cases have pushed India's infection tally to 4,16,30,885.
  • There were 2,81,109 recoveries in the last 24 hours. India's recovery rate currently is 94.91%.
